Class PathOverlay

    public class PathOverlay
extends Overlay
    Author:
    Viesturs Zarins, Martin Pearman This class draws a path line in given color.

      • addGreatCircle

        public void addGreatCircle(GeoPoint startPoint,
                  GeoPoint endPoint)
        Draw a great circle. Calculate a point for every 100km along the path.
        Parameters:
        startPoint - start point of the great circle
        endPoint - end point of the great circle

      • addGreatCircle

        public void addGreatCircle(GeoPoint startPoint,
                  GeoPoint endPoint,
                  int numberOfPoints)
        Draw a great circle.
        Parameters:
        startPoint - start point of the great circle
        endPoint - end point of the great circle
        numberOfPoints - number of points to calculate along the path

      • draw

        protected void draw(android.graphics.Canvas canvas,
        MapView mapView,
        boolean shadow)
        This method draws the line. Note - highly optimized to handle long paths, proceed with care. Should be fine up to 10K points.

        draw in class Overlay
